verbs.description: [V: slow] [ARG1: cooker cinnamon roll] come home to the heavenly aroma of fresh - baked cinnamon rolls this better - for - you version tastes just as decadent as a regular cinnamon roll but it smartly sneaks in some whole grains —nick iverson denver colorado cook roll
